email.subject: Welcome to Hacknet Extensions
email.body:
Hey, Thanks for checking out the mod tools. This extension will run your through how the tools work, and get you started on your own projects. For this guide, I strongly recommend playing in windowed mode.
Each extension has a folder in /Extensions next to Hacknet.exe That folder needs to contain ExtensionInfo.xml to define it as a mod - this contains basic setup stuff.
The folder containing the extension you're looking at right now is: #EXTENSION_FOLDER_PATH#
To complete this mission, navigate to that folder, then move to the subfolder containing this mission and open it: Missions/Intro/IntroMission1.xml
At the top of that file, you'll see a goal of type "getstring". Reply with the text in the "target" field to continue.
Good to have you with us, -Matt
